name: cloudron
features: App Platform: Complete platform for running self-hosted apps. Simplified hosting.
One-Click Apps: Install popular apps with single click. Easy deployment.
Automatic Updates: Apps update automatically with security patches. Maintained infrastructure.
Backup & Restore: Built-in backup and disaster recovery. Data protection.
Domain Management: Automatic DNS and SSL configuration. Hassle-free setup.
User Management: Centralized authentication across all apps. Single sign-on.
Professional Solution: Enterprise-grade app hosting platform. Production-ready.
